#summary Apache Common Maths is a powerful open-source library embedded in GroovyLab. We demonstrate some examples.

= Examples =


== F - Distribution ==
{{{


fx  =new FDistribution(2, 4)

t = Inc(0,0.01,10)
N= t.length
x = new double[N]
for (k in 0..N-1) 
	x[k] = fx.cumulativeProbability(t[k])
	
	plot(t, x)


}}}
